page.description: The F directive references the name of a character variable containing an owner draw format string to be applied when the list box is loaded. It is used when creating resizable column list boxes.

argument.name: Format_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of a character variable containing an owner draw format string to be applied when the list box is loaded.

section.description: For the complete example of the use of the F directive, see List Box R Directive.
